entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow mixed with rain beginning early this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
